about_page_contact_content: Join our community of over 10,000 subscribers and experience the future of reading and listening.
about_page_feature_ai_narration_desc: Every book comes with AI-generated narration in the author's voice, creating an immersive listening experience. (Except for books with license restrictions)
about_page_feature_author_benefits_desc: Authors receive 60-90% of revenue share and can easily migrate from other platforms.
about_page_feature_dual_format_desc: Switch seamlessly between reading and listening modes for the perfect experience anytime, anywhere.
about_page_feature_web3_desc: Built on blockchain technology with simple login options - use email or connect your Web3 wallet.
about_page_hero_subtitle: 3ook.com is an AI-powered book platform that transforms how you experience books - books can be both read and heard, narrated by AI in different voice actor or author's voice.
about_page_mission_content: We aim to become your AI book attendant (AI æ›¸åƒ®), bridging technology and storytelling to reshape how cultural content is transmitted and experienced.
about_page_platform_evolution: 3ook.com represents a major upgrade from Liker Land bookstore  enhanced AI capabilities, simplified user experience, and expanded mobile support.
about_page_team_content: 3ook.com is developed by Liker Land team. We're a team passionate about merging new and old industries through innovative technology.
about_page_what_is_content: 3ook.com is an evolution of Liker Land bookstore, launching with revolutionary AI-powered reading features. Built on web3 technology with a decentralized bookstore, we're re-imagining how readers connect with stories and authors.

app_description: 3ook.com is an AI reading companion coupled with a decentralized bookstore on web3, built by Liker Land. In 3ook.com, every book is both readable and audible, narrated by AI in the author's voice.

pricing_page_feature_1: AI text-to-speech in Cantonese and Mandarin
pricing_page_feature_2: 20% off all book purchases, no limit
